name: Meddy, Inc.
description: Developer of a healthcare service platform designed to find doctors online in Qatar. The company's healthcare service platform provides all information about a doctor instantly without calling the clinic and facilitates browsing of doctor's profile with their background information, enabling patients to search and book doctors online through their website.
